Module dev.kkorolyov.flopple
Package dev.kkorolyov.flopple.function.convert

Interface Converter<T,R>

Type Parameters:
T - input type
R - output type
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface Converter<T,R>
Converts elements from T to R.

    • selective

      static <T, R> Converter<T,Optional<R>> selective(Predicate<? super T> test, Converter<? super T,? extends R> delegate)
      Generates a converter which converts inputs matching a given test.
      Type Parameters:
      T - input type
      R - output type
      Parameters:
      test - filter accepting Ts to convert
      delegate - converts accepted Ts
      Returns:
      converter converting Ts matching test using delegate

    • reducing

      static <T, R> Converter<T,Optional<R>> reducing(Iterable<? extends Converter<? super T,Optional<R>>> delegates)
      Generates a converter which converts inputs using the first matching selective delegate.
      Type Parameters:
      T - input type
      R - output type
      Parameters:
      delegates - convert Ts
      Returns:
      converter converting Ts using the first non-empty-returning converter from delegates

      Converts a T to an R.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • convert

      default Collection<R> convert(Iterable<? extends T> in)
      Converts multiple Ts to Rs.
      Parameters:
      in - inputs to convert
      Returns:
      conversions of all elements in in to R type, in input order

      Type Parameters:
      R1 - next result type
      Parameters:
      next - next converter
      Returns:
